title: LF Diam+ TOP laner
body:
Hey everyone, We are a team of Diamond-Challenger players looking for a top laner to complete our roster with the intentions of playing in all of the upcoming OCE tournaments, starting tomorrow/Sunday.

Diamond+ being one of the requirements that we are looking for, Attitude and Communication will play a vital role in whether we decide to pick you up or not since currently all 4 of us have a very positive attitude and great communication.

As a side note we will be using teamspeak 3 and only that. A mic is obviously required and we expect you to be mature, In saying that there is no age requirement but I'm preferring 17+.

Anymore questions or if you're interested in the position please add me: Hebuska.

Thank you very much.

replies.body: Added. Will talk to you soon
